verses.roman:
ye-kāle dvibhuja, nāma--vaibhava-prakāśa
caturbhuja haile, nāma--prābhava-prakāśa

synonyms: ye-kāle dvi-bhuja—when the Lord appears as two-handed; nāma—named; vaibhava-prakāśa—vaibhava-prakāśa; catuḥ-bhuja haile—when He becomes four-handed; nāma—named; prābhava-prakāśa—prābhava-prakāśa.
translation: "When the Lord is two-handed, He is called vaibhava-prakāśa, and when He is four-handed He is called prābhava-prakāśa.
